machine_start_gcode.default_value: M280 P0 S160 ; release BLTouch alarm (OK to send for Non BLTouch)\M420 Z2 ; set fade leveling at 2mm for BLTouch (OK to send for Non BLTouch)\G28 ; home all\G29 ; probe bed\G92 E0 ;zero the extruded length\G1 X0.0 Y50.0 Z10.0 F3600\; perform wipe and prime\G1 Z0.0 F1000\G1 Z0.2 Y70.0 E9.0 F1000.0 ; prime\G1 Y100.0 E12.5 F1000.0 ; prime\G92 E0 ; zero extruder again\M117 Printing...

machine_end_gcode.default_value: G92 E0 ; zero the extruded length again\G1 E-1.5 F500 ; retract the filament to release some of the pressure\M104 S0 ; turn off extruder\M140 S0 ; turn off bed\G28 X0 ; home X axis\G1 Y245 ; move Y axis to end position\M84 ; disable motors\M107 ; turn off fan
